description: This command allows to list the orders, made by a user.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: List only orders, related to a given object class:DOMAINDOMAINAPPLICATIONSSLCERTTMCHMARK
List only orders with a given status of the order payment:AUTOACCOUNTAUTOINVOICEPAIDUNPAID
Depth of the list:SELF (default): return only orders of the user, executing the command
List only orders, related to the given operation type:CREATERENEWRESTORETRADETRANSFER
List only orders, related to the given operation types
List only orders with a given order ID
If set to 1 the total number of found orders will not be returend. This will increase the response time of the command
